summary: This document is a Second Home Rider related to a mortgage agreement made on December 10, 2014, between the Borrower and Fifth Third Mortgage Company. It outlines the terms regarding the occupancy and use of the property located at 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC, emphasizing that the property is to be used exclusively as a second home and not subjected to rental agreements or shared ownership.
locations: 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC 28202
keyFacts: The document is a Second Home Rider incorporated into a mortgage agreement.
The Borrower is required to occupy the property as a second home.
The Borrower cannot subject the property to any rental agreements or shared ownership arrangements.
The document specifies that providing false information during the loan application process can lead to default.
The date of the agreement is December 10, 2014.
